content: the LT's statement to refuse any orders from BHO is not so much mutiny until the order is issued, and refused. If the LT really wanted to push the issue, all new officers, with a commision signed by BHO are not legal officers, and thus not capable of ordering any enlisted. Enlisted could possibly make that same argument stick, since BHO does not have authority as the POTUS to appoint any officers. The enlisted oath is specific in following orders from the POTUS, and officers appointed over them. Could make a real lively court martial.
reply: the LT's statement to refuse any orders from BHO is not so much mutiny until the order is issued, and refused. reply: It's our job to throw Obama out so that our people in the military don't have to suffer!
title: Soldier 'Mutiny' Against Obama (Globe Magazine)

content: Will somebody PLEASE provide some real evidence that there truly IS such a person as this Lt. Easterling? So far, I've seen one person (an aledgedly serving "birther" - imagine that!) vouch for his existance, but no real proof! Will the real Lt. Easterling please stand (Man) up? It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine
